titleInfo.title: ‘Longitudinal Section at crest of proposed Scarp’

physicalDescription.extent: Materials:Pen and ink with wash on tracing clothDimensions:758 x 932 mm

mods.abstract: Distinctive Features:Produced to accompany ‘Sketch Plan shewing proposed line of Scarp on the Southern Range, ADEN’ hold at IOR/X/3258. Shows the position of tunnelled path, contain twenty three ‘Average Sections’ lettered for references which correspond to symbols present on the main plan. Measurements reported.Inscriptions:On recto, bottom left-hand corner initials [illegible].On recto, bottom right-hand corner:‘H. Pym Captn. Ex. Engineer’‘A. Delisle Ltt. Col. R.E. Acting Supd. Engr. P. Divn.’.
